titleStmt.title: Receipt (Certificate) for work performed for the penthemeral dyke corv»®e
titleStmt.author: Asklepiades; Hephaistion; Hierakion, antigrapheus

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Year ten of Imperator Caesar Domitianus Augustus Germanicus. Has performed for 5 days for work on the dikes for the same tenth year on the new dike of the canal (2nd hand) on behalf of Soknopaiou Nesos: Panephremmis the elder, son of Papeis the son of Papeis, and of Segathis. (3rd hand) I, Asklepiades, have signed. (4th hand) I, Hephaistion, have signed in respect of Panephremmis the elder,s on of Paeis. (5th hand) I, Hierakion, antigrapheus, have signed in respect of the penthemeros of the works on the embankments.

listBibl.bibl: Sijpesteijn PJ, CE 53, 133-134, 1978 Sijpesteijn PJ, PMich XV, 690, 1982, Pl. IV -- BL VIII, 219 (l. 2; 4). - L. 1-2: read Autokratoros Kaisaros Domiitianou Sebastou ; Germanikou, rather than Autokratoros Kaisaraos Ouespasianou ; Sebastou; thus to be dated of 90-91 A.D. instead of 77-78 A.D. (PH)
